remarks: Show membership in the span of the sum of two vectors, one of which ( ` Y ` ) is fixed in advance.  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-2015.)
statement:
lspfixed.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspfixed.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lspfixed.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspfixed.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspfixed.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspfixed.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspfixed.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspfixed.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
lspfixed.e $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspfixed.f $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Z } ) ) $.
lspfixed.g $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( N ` { Y , Z } ) ) $.
lspfixed $p |- ( ph -> E. z e. ( ( N ` { Z } ) \ { .0. } ) X e. ( N ` { ( Y .+ z ) } ) ) $.
$d .+ z $.
$d .0. z $.
$d N z $.
$d W z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
$d Z z $.
